name: Septillion
description:
In Septillion, you play a card game against an AI. The rules are simple:

- You can play either a seven, or a card that is beside one already on the board.

- If you cannot play, you must pick a card from the deck.

- If you cannot play and there is no deck, you will pass.

- Wins the first one to get out of cards.

You control the game with the mouse, and click on the cards that you want to play, or the deck when you have to pick a card.
